body.text: Cards are a way that Applications can share or collect information in Webex Teams.  Cards can display rich information including images, formatted text and links.   Cards can also be used to collect detailed information from Webex Teams users that would be difficult to obtain using a purely text based interface.
Users canâ€™t send cards using the Webex Teams client but applications can use the /messages API to send a card
In the coming lessons we'll discuss times when an application might use a card instead of sending text based messages and waiting for users to respond the same way.
